author: Rachel Janfaza
title: As Roe v. Wade hangs in the balance, Democratic candidates prioritize abortion rights in 2022

sentence: Georgia, Stacey Abrams vs. Brian Kemp Florida, Charlie Crist vs. Ron DeSantis Texas, Beto vs. Abbott Close your eyes and imagine for a moment a string of victory parties for the good guys right after the November elections.
title: Truth Sandwich: MAGAT Dog Catches Roe Car
Where Does the Anti-Abortion Movement Go After Roe?
